class="_T"><div class="JLKop w"><button class="BrOJk u j z _F wSSLS HuPlH Vonfv" type="button" aria-haspopup="menu" aria-label="Open Options Menu"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20px" height="20px" class="d Vb UmNoP" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M5 14a2 2 0 1 0 0-4 2 2 0 0 0 0 4m14 0a2 2 0 1 0 0-4 2 2 0 0 0 0 4m-7 0a2 2 0 1 0 0-4 2 2 0 0 0 0 bubbles</title><path d="M 12 0C5.388 0 0 5.388 0 12s5.388 12 12 12 12-5.38 12-12c0-6.612-5.38-12-12-12z" transform=""></path><path d="M 12 0C5.388 0 0 5.388 0 12s5.388 12 12 12 12-5.38 12-12c0-6.612-5.38-12-12-12z" transform="translate(26 0)"></path><path d="M 12 0C5.388 0 0 5.388 0 12s5.388 12 12 12 12-5.38 12-12c0-6.612-5.38-12-12-12z" transform="translate(52 0)"></path><path d="M 12 0C5.388 0 0 5.388 0 12s5.388 12 12 12 12-5.38 12-12c0-6.612-5.38-12-12-12z" transform="translate(78 0)"></path><path d="M 12 0C5.388 0 0 5.388 0 12s5.388 12 12 12 12-5.38 12-12c0-6.612-5.38-12-12-12z" transform="translate(104 0)"></path></svg></div><div class="biGQs _P fiohW qWPrE ncFvv fOtGX"><a target="_blank" tabindex="0" href="/ShowUserReviews-g274772-d17564840-r997942407-Wieliczka_Salt_Mine_Guided_Tour_from_Krakow_with_hotel_pickup-Krakow_Lesser_Pol.html" class="BMQDV _F Gv wSSLS SwZTJ FGwzt ukgoS"><span class="yCeTE">Great Trip - Highly Recommend!</span></a></div><div class="_T FKffI bmUTE"><div class="fIrGe _T bgMZj" style="-webkit-line-clamp: 7; line-break: normal; cursor: pointer;"><div class="biGQs _P pZUbB KxBGd"><span class="JguWG"><span class="yCeTE">We were picked up at our apartment by Piter bang on time at 11:35.  We were informed of this at 8pm the previous evening.  From the offset Piter was very welcoming.  En route to the Salt Mines (which took around 45 minutes), Piter drove through the Ghetto and discussed points of interest with the group.  He then dropped us off at the Salt Mines and made sure we met our tour guide there.  The Salt Mines were fascinating and a must-do if visiting Krakow.  We started the tour around 12:45 and we were out of the Salt mines around 15:30.  There is a lot of walking on the tour.  Firstly you do down flights of stairs.  There are usually other tour groups so you don't feel rushed.  You are then taken into various chambers and the tour guide will talk through each one (no spoilers!).  At the end of the tour you then have the option to go to the museum or queue for the lift.  As we knew Piter would be waiting to take our group back into Krakow we decided to opt for the lift.  We waited quite a bit of time for the lift and it was quite a walk (to the other side of the mine), however, once in the lift it was very quick and probably fits around 20 people.  I didn't feel claustrophobic at all in the mines and the air is very well circulated.  We then met Piter at the agreed spot and on the way back to Krakow centre he took us through the ghetto and pointed out further points of interest and provided some great information on schindlers factory.  He then dropped us off at our preferred spot in Krakow old town.  All in all, the salt mines was a great experience and Piter who took us too and from the mines was exceptional and extremely knowledgeable about the area.  I would highly recommend.</span></span></div></div><div class="lszDU" style="line-height: 22px;"><button class="UikNM _G B- _S _W _T c G_ wSSLS wnNQG" type="button"><span class="biGQs _P XWJSj Wb">Read more</span><div class="CECjK _W"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20px" height="20px" class="d Vb UmNoP" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M18.4 7.4 12 13.7 5.6 7.4 4.2 8.8l7.8 7.8 7.8-7.8z"></path></svg></div></button></div></div><div></div><div class="biGQs _P pZUbB xUqsL mowmC KxBGd"><a target="_blank" tabindex="0" href="/AttractionProductReview-g274772-d17564840-Wieliczka_Salt_Mine_Guided_Tour_from_Krakow_with_hotel_pickup-Krakow_Lesser_Poland.html#REVIEWS" class="BMQDV _F Gv wSSLS SwZTJ FGwzt suezE">Review of: Wieliczka Salt Mine: Guided Tour from Krakow (with hotel pickup)</a></div><div class="TreSq"><div class="biGQs _P pZUbB ncFvv osNWb">Written March 12, 2025</div><div class="biGQs _P pZUbB mowmC osNWb">This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. His knowledge of the island is second to none and he took some fabulous photos of us at the Corralejo Dunes. The Aloe farm visit made our skin so soft and the Argentinian Restaurant he recommended in El Cortillo was 1st class, this trip is great value and we had a great day.
